snippet: Derrick Rose and four returnees from the 2012 Olympic men’s basketball championship team were among the 19 players selected for this summer’s United States national team roster.
abstract: Derrick Rose and four returnees from the 2012 Olympic men’s basketball championship team are among the 19 players selected for this summer’s United States national team roster for World Cup of Basketball.
lead_paragraph: Derrick Rose and four returnees from the 2012 Olympic men’s basketball championship team were among the 19 players selected for this summer’s United States national team roster.
